org.linqs.psl.model.rule

Interface WeightedGroundRule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GroundRule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WeightedGroundArithmeticRule, WeightedGroundLogicalRule

    public interface WeightedGroundRule
extends GroundRule

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Returns the incompatibility of the truth values of this GroundRule's GroundAtoms.

    • Method Detail

      • getRule

        WeightedRule getRule()
        Specified by:
        getRule in interface GroundRule
        Returns:
        this GroundRule's parent Rule

      • isSquared

        boolean isSquared()

      • getWeight

        double getWeight()
        Returns the Weight of this WeightedGroundRule. Until setWeight() is called, this GroundRule's weight is the current weight of its parent Rule. After it is called, it remains the most recent Weight set by setWeight().

      • setWeight

        void setWeight(double weight)
        Sets a weight for this WeightedGroundRule.

      • getFunctionDefinition

        GeneralFunction getFunctionDefinition()

      • getIncompatibility

        double getIncompatibility()
        Returns the incompatibility of the truth values of this GroundRule's GroundAtoms. Incompatibility is always non-negative.

      • getIncompatibility

        double getIncompatibility(GroundAtom replacementAtom,
                          float replacementValue)
        Returns the incompatibility of the truth values of this GroundRule's GroundAtoms given the replacment of a single atom's value with another value. This method should only be used by callers that really know what they are doing. Incompatibility is always non-negative.
